article_text:
What ever happened to the audacity of hope? When it comes to Barack Obama’s wishful pledges of geopolitical intent—isolating Russia and making it a pariah, or degrading and destroying Islamic State—the slogan has amounted to nothing.

The president’s reset with Russia? The rejiggering was all Vladimir Putin’s: aggression in Ukraine and Syria that made the U.S. look very much less than the democratic world’s single recourse able...

twitter.description: The Continent is growing disenchanted with Barack Obama, says John Vinocur in The Wall Street Journal.
twitter.title: Europe Gives Up on ‘Hope’
